name: Endless Runner X
description:
It’s just another endless runner... or is it?

It may look like the same old cycle again and again - run, jump, die, repeat - but corrupting the code can create the chance to elude the endless monotony, find new meaning and free our helpless hero!

Prove that you are the player with the finger tapping, puzzle solving and system fighting skills to rival them all!

Find the secret, rise to the challenge, and escape the loop!

GAME FEATURES
• Easy to play! Just tap to jump... at first...
• Secrets abound! Corrupt the code and discover the story.
• Endless arcade fun! Unlock new levels and game modes.
• Epic challenge! For casual and hardcore players alike.
• Leaderboards! Compete with your friends and the world.

Please note:
‘Endless Runner X’ is free to play and supported by in-game ads. An in-app purchase is available to remove ads from the game.
